DOC.brief_title: Developmentally Supportive Care Neurobehavioral Outcome Preterm Very Low Birth Weight Neonates
DOC.detailed_description: Enrolled neonate provide routine supportive care per exist NICU protocol . This carry initial 6 month ( 0-180 day ) study commencement . This group serve control group ( group A ) . During subsequent 6 month ( 181-360 day ) study period , enrol neonate fulfil inclusion criterion provide routine supportive care component developmentally supportive care ( DSC ) . DSC component strictly emphasize protected sleep , pain stress assessment management , activity daily live ( position , feed skin care ) , heal environment . This group designate group B . Both group receive appropriate management morbidity per exist NICU protocol . Both group follow till 37 week gestation neurobehavioral assessment perform use Neurobehavioural assessment preterm infant score . In group baseline data regard antenatal factor record predesigned proforma age , gravid , Gestational age , Chorioamnionitis , Prenatal steroid , Multiple pregnancy , maternal comorbidities ( preeclampsia , gestational diabetes mellitus ) , mode delivery etc .
DOC.criteria: All stable preterm low birth weight baby invasive mechanical ventilation Hemodynamically stable Parental consent Babies major congenital anomaly Asphyxia ( Apgar score < 3 5mins ) .
